lead_paragraph: After a funeral home mix-up, the family of Val-Jean McDonald wondered whose body was put in her coffin. The son of the other woman saw an article about the error and told his story.

headline.print_headline: Who Was in Coffin? Son Recalls Mix-Up Tale
headline.main: Son of Wrongly Cremated Woman Comes Forward, Resolving a Macabre Mystery

snippet: After a funeral home mix-up, the family of Val-Jean McDonald wondered whose body was put in her coffin. The son of the other woman saw an article about the error and told his story.
abstract: Donald Little of Bronx describes how he was informed by McCall's Bronxwood Funeral Home that his mother Annie Pearl Little had been mistakenly cremated; mix up at funeral home led to Little being confused for Val-Jean McDonald and laid out in McDonald's coffin before being cremated; funeral home has apologized to Little and his family, who say they do not believe in cremation.
